name: Food And Drink 11- Cereal Quiz | Food & Drink | 10 Questions

questions.text: What Kellogg's cereal was promoted in 1931 ads reading 'what a pity when constipation can be overcome so easily'?
Tony the Tiger is the animated spokesperson for Kellogg's Frosted Flakes.
What breakfast cereal challenges you to 'pinch an inch'?
What US breakfast food has 'two scoops of raisins' in every box?
What breakfast cereal was originally called Elijah's Manna?
What breakfast cereal had marshmallows bits shaped like hearts, rainbows, moons and clovers?
Which cereal is known in the US as the 'breakfast of champions'?
questions.explanation:
Wheaties.

	In the UK, it's porridge.

questions.text: Cheerioats was the original name of Cheerios.
What Kellogg's cereal debuted in 1952 with a 29 percent sugar content?
Frosted Flakes contain twice the calories per serving as Corn Flakes.
questions.explanation:
False.

	They contain the same amount of sugar.
